name: Mistakes Two
description:
This game was made for the game jam "Rhytm Jam". The theme we chosen is Every error

Are you ready to play music with a partner? Be in sync with each other in this two-player rhythm game! But beware of "mistakes", these will confuse your partner or both of you if you make one. Acceleration of the music, dancing notes, visual effects, and many others will make your task more difficult.

How to play :

After putting in your name, each player will be assigned a left/right section of the screen. Player 1 will play the QWER keyboard keys and Player 2 789+. Press the corresponding keys as soon as the notes reach their respective targets.

When a player misses a note, an "error" is triggered, affecting the other player. The effect is to be expected according to the error wheel at the bottom of your screens.

This game is designed to be played by two players, but there is nothing to stop you from trying to play alone with both hands, like a pianist.

Errors list :

Follow this files for more information about the "errors" you might encounter

https://ibb.co/87dc8pb

Thanks for playing our game <(^-^)> !!
